name: Sauzier's Fall Sign
description: The midday sun creates rainbows in the spray of Sauzier Waterfall as pirate and witch stand side by side on the wet stone ledge. Three rune-arrows have been carved deep into the rock face, their meanings lost to time but their directions clear: East, South, East. The falling water translates their message into a single bearing—110 degrees true, where three arrows fall but one bearing stands eternal. Bearing 110°. Cipher output: TE. "Three arrows fall, one bearing stands."
riddle: Three arrows fall, one bearing stands.
